Hello,

Although I am new to this group, I have been using heritrix for a f=
ew
months now. I really like the structure and modularity of your
applicati=
on.

At the moment I am trying to create a 'wrapper' User interface for
her=
itrix using JMX and jetty.

I am trying to create a notification listener t=
hat sends a message to my
client (UI) when a crawl on the server finishes. =
I use the following
code:

con.addNotificationListener(objectName, new JMXL=
istener(), new
MBeanServerNotificationFilter(), "crawler");

Where con is a=
n MBeanServerConnection, and JMXListener is a simple
NotificationListener w=
hich prints a message. The connection is already
working, I can create a Cr=
awlController proxy and control a job, I just
don't receive any notificatio=
ns. Any suggestions would be appreciated!

Thanks,

Mario de Jonge
